i enjoy eating italian food.

content.text: It's been a while since I've been to a comic con!
I go to comic cons every year, they're so much fun!
I wish I could go more often.
You should! It's a great way to dress up, meet new people, and see your favorite comics and shows.
I know, I just don't have the time.
Well, if you ever do, come to New York City and we can go together.
I would love that! I've always wanted to go to New York City.
It's a great city, you'll love it.
I'm sure I will. So, what kind of comics do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of comics, but I'm a big fan of superhero comics.
Me too! I love Batman and Superman.
Those are great! I'm also a big fan of Spider-Man and Wonder Woman.
I love Wonder Woman! She's so strong and independent.
She is! She's one of my favorite superheroes.
I'm glad we agree. It's always nice to meet someone who's a fan of the same things you are.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about comics
